original_text: After that, the priest must wash his clothes and bathe himself with water. He may then come into the camp, but he will be ceremonially unclean till evening.
korean_text: 제사장은 자기의 옷을 빨고 물로 몸을 씻은 후에 진영에 들어갈 것이라 그는 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: the priest must wash his clothes
He may then come into the camp
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그는 진영으로 들어갈 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: but he will be ceremonially unclean
